snippet: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, which published all three of Jonah Lehrer’s books, confirmed after fact-checking the book that it would no longer offer it for sale.
abstract: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, which published all three of Jonah Lehrer’s books, confirms after fact-checking that it will no longer offer his second book How We Decide for sale; it is second book journalist-wunderkind-turned-plagiarist-and-disgraced-author that publisher has pulled.
lead_paragraph: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt, which published all three of Jonah Lehrer’s books, confirmed after fact-checking the book that it would no longer offer it for sale.
